quotes.quote: There are three kinds of lies: lies, damned lies, and statistics.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: USA Today has come out with a new survey - apparently, three out of every four people make up 75% of the population.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: Statistician: A man who believes figures don't lie, but admits that under analysis some of them won't stand up either.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Statistics: The only science that enables different experts using the same figures to draw different conclusions.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Smoking is one of the leading causes of statistics.
quotes.author: Fletcher Knebel

quotes.quote: A single death is a tragedy; a million deaths is a statistic.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin
